subject: Horse Racing
Curlin (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Steve Asmussen broke his own record for most wins in a year when Prophesy provided victory No. 556. Asmussen, who trains Curlin, the reigning Horse of the Year, set the record of 555 wins in 2004. On Saturday, he equaled that mark with two winners, and topped the record in Sunday’s first race at Remington Park in Oklahoma City. Prophesy, the even-money favorite, won by a half-length.
